SELECT ROWNO, KikwanCd , KikwanName , SysIp , EncIp , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID , ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY KikwanCd) ROWNO, KikwanCd , KikwanName , SysIp , EncIp , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID , ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21
UPPER(KikwanCd) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#searchKikwanCd#) || '%'
KikwanName LIKE '%' || #searchKikwanName# || '%'
) TMP WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21
KikwanCd LIKE '%' || #searchKikwanCd# || '%'
KikwanName LIKE '%' || #searchKikwanName# || '%'
SELECT KikwanCd , KikwanName , SysIp , EncIp , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID , ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21 WHERE TRIM(KikwanCd) = TRIM(#kikwanCd#)

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21 SET KikwanName = #kikwanName#, SysIp = #SysIp#, EncIP = #EncIp#, ThisMsgUseYn = #thisMsgUseYn#, ThisMsgAmndrID = #userid#, ThisMsgAmndHMS = TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') WHERE KikwanCd = #kikwanCd#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21 ( KikwanCd , KikwanName , SysIp , EncIp , ThisMsgUseYn , ThisMsgRegsntID , ThisMsgRegiHMS , ThisMsgAmndrID , ThisMsgAmndHMS ) VALUES ( #kikwanCd# , #kikwanName# , #SysIp#, #EncIp#, #thisMsgUseYn# , #userid# , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), #userid# , TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3') )
SELECT REPLACE(CONCAT('KJB',TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(substr(NVL(MAX(KikwanCd),'0000'),4))+1,'0999999')),' ','') AS AUTOCD FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBJ21 WHERE KikwanCd LIKE 'KJB%'
